name: MultiGame (stickcoder)
description:
A small collection of popular mini-games. These are just eazy to make games that I wanted to put into a collection.I am using the free version of construct, so please understand that I cannot make very many mini-games.

Controls: turret dodge:

A =  move left

D = move right

Break Out:

A =  move left

D = move right

Click = start

Build:

click and drag to move the blocks

right click to destroy them

click the button to spawn a block

General:

click to select

Esc to leave a mini-game

click the exit button in main menu to close the game

Enjoy!
